task.title: Run the Extended Pipeline
task.shortdesc: Now that the extended pipeline is complete, let's reset the origin and run the pipeline again.

context.p: Reset the origin when you want the Data Collector to process all available data instead of processing data from the last-saved offset. Not all origins can be reset, but you can reset the origin for Directory.

step.cmd: In the console menu bar, click the More icon, and then click Reset Origin.
When the confirmation dialog box displays, click Yes.
To start the pipeline, click the Start icon.

taskbody.result:
The console goes into monitor mode and the data alert triggers again. Before long, you'll see some error records in the Jython Evaluator and the Field Converter.
For each stage, you can see the error messages for latest error records. To look at all the error records, go to the location configured to accept error records.
Error records include a great deal of information about the record. The following fields can help determine the cause of the error:
